content.html: I don't want to embarrass folks like @cassidoo and @techgirl1908. But I'm having a moment where I can see how much has changed about who gets recognition and admiration in the dev community. We are choosing better leaders, and it shows the growth we've been pushing for.
content.value: I don't want to embarrass folks like @cassidoo and @techgirl1908. But I'm having a moment where I can see how much has changed about who gets recognition and admiration in the dev community. We are choosing better leaders, and it shows the growth we've been pushing for.
